element.name: Ben'nir
element.description:
"We're all made from stardust."
PHYSICAL DESCRIPTION
Ben'nir are mostly dark skinned people. Most of them prefer warm colours, but some of them tend towards colder colors in their clothing.
HISTORY
Ben'nir came from the stars. They traveled millions of miles, embedded in layers of sunshine, as the last wish of a dying star to carry on it's legacy.
SOCIETY
The Ben'nir don't really have their own society, however they are intend on exploring those of other and are always curious.
Ben'nir Names
Male:Rahav, Tzemach, Yoav, Avim, Tal
Female:Danel, Tzurit, Pe'erli, Shirat
BEN'NIR TRAITS
Ben'nir are the souls of long dead stars, now wandering the planes. Ability Score Increase.Your Charisma score increases by 3, and your Dexterity score increases by 2.
Age.Ben'nir are born from the light of dying stars, they are the immortal souls of these dead stars.
Alignment.Being bron into this world, after so many years of seldom existence, Ben'nir are naturally curious, so their alignment tends towards chaotic behavior.
Size.Ben'nir reach from under 5 to almost 7 feet. Your size is medium.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 30 feet.
Flight You have a flying speed of 40 feet.
Darkvision. Thanks to your heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You canâ€™t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.
Radiant Soul.You have immunity to radiant and fire damage. Also whenever you start your turn in daylight you regain hit points equal to 1d6 + your charisma modifier.
Star born.You are the immortal soul of a dead star. You do not need to eat, drink, breathe, or sleep. You never make Endurance checks to resist the effects of exhaustion, starvation, thirst, or suffocation. You count as a celestial. All other conditions and effects affect you normally.
Solar Origins.You know the Produce Flame cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level you can cast the Daylight spell at will. Once you reach 5th level, you can also cast the Alter Self once per day. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write Common, Celestial, Primoridal and one extra language of your choice. .
